Grand_Prairie.The Potter's House Church, Dallas:
The Potter's House is a megachurch in Dallas, Texas, United States founded by T. D. Jakes. Outreach Magazine ranked it the 10th largest in the USA as of 2008 based on a weekly attendance of 17,000 and a capacity of about 8,000.


== History ==
The church building was established by televangelist W. V. Grant as the Eagles Nest Family Church.
